translations: 回水；死水；停滞不进的状态或地方
死水般的；倒退的，落后的

sentences.sentence: This agency will be relegated to the backwaters of Washington.
sentences.translation: 这个机构将被移到华盛顿闭塞落后的地方。

sentences.sentence: Electric windows, electric locks, and electric trunk catches were the latest gadgets, but wipers were one of the backwaters of automotive technology.
sentences.translation: 电动窗、电动锁和电动后盖是最新的发明，但雨刷却是汽车技术的死水。

sentences.sentence: These things happen: bright young things never last long in backwaters.
sentences.translation: 情况总是这样：年轻有为的人决不会在死水中待很久。
